meanings.sent1: The surliest cat in the neighborhood hissed at everyone who passed by.
meanings.sent2: She gave the surliest look to her brother when he ate the last cookie.
meanings.sent3: Despite his surliest expression, his friends knew he was just having a bad day.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in the sky, looking surliest before the rain began to pour.
meanings.sent5: The old man's surliest behavior made him quite unpopular among the townspeople.

meanings.definition: In a bad-tempered or unfriendly manner.
meanings.sent1: She spoke surliest when she was woken up from her nap.
meanings.sent2: He glared surliest at the noisy neighbors who kept him up all night.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked surliest at the mailman, thinking he was an intruder.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled surliest through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher scolded the students surliest for not completing their homework.
